name: Kenta Companion
author: WP Moose

sections.description: Kenta Companion is an extension to the Kenta theme. It provides a lot of features and one-click demo import for Kenta Theme. Learn more: https://kentatheme.com/
sections.changelog:
v1.2.6

  • Fix: Container style error

v1.2.5

  • Add: More scroll to top button style option
  • Ref: Remove jQuery dependencies

v1.2.4

  • Fix: Widgets Area naming conflict
  • Ref: WP 6.5 support
  • Ref: Update Freemius SDK

v1.2.3

  • Ref: Kenta v1.3.0 compatible
  • Ref: Update notice appearance

v1.2.2

  • Add: Support customizer/dynamic cache
  • Fix: Don’t load plugin on incompatible kenta version
  • Ref: Security update

v1.2.1

  • Add: Particles effect support
  • Ref: Kenta v1.2.5 compatible

v1.2.0

  • Add: Custom fonts support (Premium)
  • Ref: Update Freemius SDK
  • Ref: WP6.3 support

v1.1.9

  • Add: Reset theme customizer options button
  • Ref: Update Freemius SDK
  • Ref: WP6.2 support

v1.1.8

  • Fix: SDK error
  • Ref: PHP8.1 compatible

v1.1.7

  • Fix: wp_insert_category function undefined error
  • Add: Deactivate classic editor notice

v1.1.6

  • Add: Refresh starter sites list after update
  • Ref: Kenta v1.1.9 compatible

v1.1.5

  • Ref: Kenta v1.1.6 compatible

v1.1.4

  • Ref: Cache part of dynamic CSS
  • Ref: Kenta v1.1.4 compatible

v1.1.3

  • Fix: Demo import error
  • Ref: Kenta v1.1.3 compatible

v1.1.2

  • Ref: Admin dashboard optimize

v1.1.1

  • Ref: Kenta v1.1.1 compatible

v1.1.0

  • Fix: Security Updates
  • Ref: Compatibility Enhancement

v1.0.9

  • Fix: Remove cookies consent buttons border
  • Fix: Premium Kenta Blocks plugin dependency check

v1.0.8

  • Ref: Kenta v1.0.11 support

v1.0.7

  • Add: Lightbox effect (Premium)
  • Ref: Update social controls

v1.0.6

  • Fix: Fatal error when Kenta Theme is out of date

v1.0.5

  • Ref: PHP 7.2 & PHP 8.0 support
  • Ref: Remove to top, socials extensions (Kenta Theme built-in)

v1.0.4

  • Fix: Datetime element css classes name spell error

v1.0.3

  • Ref: Kenta v1.0.2 compatible

v1.0.2

  • Add: Cookies Consent box z-index option
  • Add: Kenta theme old version notice

v1.0.1

  • Add: Admin contact us form

v1.0.0

  • Hello Word!

short_description: Kenta Companion is an extension to the Kenta theme. It provides a lot of features and one-click demo import for Kenta Theme.
